mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company( id, companyname, legalperson, organizationcode, fax, mail, address, website, businesslicense ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{companyname}, #{legalperson}, #{organizationcode}, #{fax}, #{mail}, #{address}, #{website}, #{businesslicense} )
mapper.select: select id from company where companyname=#{companyname}
select c.* from company c left join user u on c.id=u.companyid where u.mobile=#{mobile}
select id,companyid,content from companydescribe where companyid=#{companyid} and isdel=0 order by createtime desc
select 1 from companydescribe where companyid=#{companyid} and content = #{content} and isdel = 0
mapper.insert: insert into companydescribe ( id, companyid, content) VALUES ( #{id}, #{companyid}, #{content} )
mapper.update: update companydescribe set isdel = 1 where id = #{descid}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, companyname, legalperson, organizationcode, businesslicense, fax, mail, website, address, state, itemcheckstate, guarantee FROM company a, companydescribe b WHERE a.id = b.companyid and (a.companyname like CONCAT('%',#{searchtext},'%') or b.content like CONCAT('%',#{searchtext},'%')) GROUP BY a.id
select * from company a left join user b on a.companyid=b.id where b.id=#{id}
